org.atmosphere.vibe

Class DefaultServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.atmosphere.vibe.DefaultServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action<ServerTransport>, Server
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClusteredServer

    public class DefaultServer
extends Object
implements Server
    Default implementation of Server.

    This implementation consumes ServerTransport and produces ServerSocket following the Vibe protocol.

    The following options are configurable.

    • setHeartbeat(int)
    Author:
    Donghwan Kim

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultServer()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Sentence all()
      Returns a sentence that every socket in this server have to follow.

      Executes the given action retrieving every socket in this server.

      Returns a sentence that the socket tagged with the given tags in this server have to follow.
      Server byTag(String[] names, Action<ServerSocket> action)
      Executes the given action retrieving the socket tagged with the given tags in this server.
      Server byTag(String name, Action<ServerSocket> action)
      Executes the given action retrieving the socket tagged with the given tag in this server.

      void set_heartbeat(int _heartbeat)

      • byTag

        public Server byTag(String name,
           Action<ServerSocket> action)
        Description copied from interface: Server
        Executes the given action retrieving the socket tagged with the given tag in this server. The given action will be executed multiple times per socket if sockets are found and won't be executed if not found.
        Specified by:
        byTag in interface Server

      • byTag

        public Server byTag(String[] names,
           Action<ServerSocket> action)
        Description copied from interface: Server
        Executes the given action retrieving the socket tagged with the given tags in this server. The given action will be executed multiple times per socket if sockets are found and won't be executed if not found.
        Specified by:
        byTag in interface Server

      • socketAction

        public Server socketAction(Action<ServerSocket> action)
        Description copied from interface: Server
        Registers an action to be called when the socket has been opened in this server. It's allowed to add several actions at any time, so you don't need to centralize all your code to one class.
        Specified by:
        socketAction in interface Server

      • setHeartbeat

        public void setHeartbeat(int heartbeat)
        A heartbeat interval in milliseconds to maintain a connection alive and prevent server from holding idle connections. The default is 20s and should be larger than 5s.

      • set_heartbeat

        public void set_heartbeat(int _heartbeat)
        To speed up the protocol tests. Not for production use.
